steps.name: Home page is displayed

elements.name: Verify valid users can sign in

steps.name: The user provides the username as "standard_user" and password as "secret_sauce"
The user clicks the 'Login' button
The user should login successfully and is brought to the inventory page
Home page is displayed

elements.name: Verify valid users can sign in

steps.name: The user provides the username as "problem_user" and password as "secret_sauce"
The user clicks the 'Login' button
The user should login successfully and is brought to the inventory page
Home page is displayed

elements.name: Verify locked out user gets locked out message

steps.name: The user provides the username as "locked_out_user" and password as "secret_sauce"
The user clicks the 'Login' button
The user should be shown a locked out message
Home page is displayed

elements.name: Verify invalid users cannot sign in

steps.name: The user provides the username as "fake_user" and password as "bogus"
The user clicks the 'Login' button
The user should be shown an invalid username/password message

name: Login tests
description: As a user I want to verify Login scenarios

steps.name: Home page is displayed

The user clicks the 'Login' button

The user clicks the 'Menu' button
The user clicks the 'Logout' button

The user clicks the 'Login' button
The user should login successfully and is brought to the inventory page

The user clicks the 'Logout' button

name: Logout tests
description: As a user I want to verify Logout scenarios

steps.name: Home page is displayed
The user provides the username as "standard_user" and password as "secret_sauce"
The user clicks the 'Login' button

elements.name: Verify valid users can Filter products

steps.name: The user should login successfully and is brought to the inventory page
The user clicks the 'Filter' button
The user selects "low to high" option
verify selected "low to high" is applied
Home page is displayed
The user provides the username as "standard_user" and password as "secret_sauce"
The user clicks the 'Login' button

elements.name: Verify valid users can Filter products

steps.name: The user should login successfully and is brought to the inventory page
The user clicks the 'Filter' button
The user selects "high to low" option
verify selected "high to low" is applied
Home page is displayed
The user provides the username as "standard_user" and password as "secret_sauce"
The user clicks the 'Login' button

elements.name: Verify valid users can Filter products

steps.name: The user should login successfully and is brought to the inventory page
The user clicks the 'Filter' button
The user selects "A to Z" option
verify selected "A to Z" is applied
Home page is displayed
The user provides the username as "standard_user" and password as "secret_sauce"
The user clicks the 'Login' button

elements.name: Verify valid users can Filter products

steps.name: The user should login successfully and is brought to the inventory page
The user clicks the 'Filter' button
The user selects "Z to A" option
verify selected "Z to A" is applied
Home page is displayed
The user provides the username as "standard_user" and password as "secret_sauce"
The user clicks the 'Login' button

elements.name: Place a single item in the shopping cart

steps.name: The user adds "1" item by clicking Add To Cart
The user clicks on the shopping cart
There should be "1" items in the shopping cart
Home page is displayed
The user provides the username as "standard_user" and password as "secret_sauce"
The user clicks the 'Login' button

elements.name: Place multiple items in the shopping cart

steps.name: The user adds "4" item by clicking Add To Cart
The user clicks on the shopping cart
There should be "4" items in the shopping cart
Home page is displayed
The user provides the username as "standard_user" and password as "secret_sauce"
The user clicks the 'Login' button

elements.name: Remove items in the shopping cart

steps.name: The user adds "4" item by clicking Add To Cart
The user clicks on the shopping cart
There should be "4" items in the shopping cart
the user removes "1" item from cart
There should be "3" items in the shopping cart
Home page is displayed
The user provides the username as "standard_user" and password as "secret_sauce"
The user clicks the 'Login' button
The user adds "3" item by clicking Add To Cart
The user clicks on the shopping cart
There should be "3" items in the shopping cart
The user clicks 'Checkout'
The user provides the first name as "Mehdi" and last name as "Salehi" and zip code as "74600"
The user clicks 'Continue'
verify that sum of individual items is equal to the items total
The user clicks 'Finish'
Verify checkout is complete
